original: Submarines are stealthy vessels designed to take out undefended convoys. The early models from the Great War pave the way for new methods of naval warfare.
translation: 潜艇是擅长于对付无武装的运输船的暗影猎手。第一次世界大战中的早期潜艇改变了海战的面貌。

original: Better armed and more stable, new submarine designs are made to take advantage of advancements in naval tactics and have longer range, being able to attack distant convoy routes.
translation: 新的潜艇拥有更好的武装以及更佳的稳定性，它们在设计中就考虑到了海军战术的最新发展并拥有更大的航程来满足袭击更远的航运路线的需要。

original: The role of the submarine in the fleet outside of convoy attacks is still under debate. Achieving a balance between combination of speed, range and weaponry will be key to the necessary model.
translation: 关于潜艇在舰队中除了袭击运输船之外还应担任什么角色目前还有很大争议。各国海军都需要一种速度、航程以及武器三方面较为均衡的潜艇。

original: Increased test depth and efficient layouts will be features of the modern submarines, taking advantage of field experience to select appropriate armaments and engines.
translation: 现代潜艇有着更深的测试潜深和更为优化的布局。根据战场上得到的经验，人们还为它们安装了更加合理的武器以及引擎。

original: To ensure the safety of convoys, the destroyers of the Great War must be repurposed and developed. Arming vessels with more torpedoes will allow more opportunities to engage.
translation: 为了确保运输船的安全，第一次世界大战的驱逐舰需要更改它们的定位并改变它们的设计。新的设计将拥有更多的鱼雷来增加与敌人交火的机会。

original: Longer torpedo range and faster reload speeds, along with new types of armaments such as anti-air turrets, will allow our destroyers to remain efficient and versatile.
translation: 更长的鱼雷射程和更快的装填时间，外加诸如高角炮塔的新设计将使我们的驱逐舰变成更高效的多面手。

original: To better face threats from above and below, new destroyers must be outfitted with radar and modern anti-air and anti-submarine weaponry.
translation: 为了应对来自空中以及水下的威胁，新型驱逐舰必须装备有雷达和更加先进的防空与反潜武器。

original: The modern destroyer must be fitted with a variety of different detection technologies, new depth charge deployment systems and be built at a larger scale than their predecessors.
translation: 现代驱逐舰必须拥有多种不同的索敌装备，新型的深弹投放系统以及与以前的驱逐舰相比更大的吨位。

original: Light cruisers equipped with a large number of torpedo tubes, at the cost of a smaller main battery and fewer anti-aircraft guns.
translation: 以拆除一些主炮和防空炮为代价，搭载着大量鱼雷发射管的轻巡洋舰。

original: Maneuverable light cruisers that can maintain a high speed will continue to be useful for scouting missions.
translation: 快速灵活的轻巡洋舰仍然是执行侦察任务的一个不错的选择。

original: Post-war treaties put restrictions on cruisers, but well-armed light vessels can be developed while remaining within these limits.
translation: 虽然战后的条约对轻巡洋舰提出了诸多限制，但是人们还是在条约的限制内设计出了火力出众的轻型船只。

original: Now skirting the limits of treaties, larger and more heavily armored cruisers can be built, still with light enough weaponry to be classified as light cruisers.
translation: 现在条约的限制解除了，人们可以设计更大也更重的巡洋舰，不过较弱的火力使它们还只能被划分为轻巡洋舰。

original: Tactically employed to protect larger ships, the modern generation of light cruisers can shake off most past restrictions and be better armed to handle aerial attacks.
translation: 由于战术中常常被用于保护其他大型船只，现代轻巡洋舰可以摆脱过去的种种限制并专心应对来自空中的威胁。

original: The Washington Naval Treaty was set up to prevent an arms race in cruisers, among other ships, but this seems inevitable. By keeping armor light, the weapons load can be increased.
translation: 华盛顿海军条约设立的目的就是为了避免巡洋舰以及其他舰种的竞赛，然而这看起来是不可避免的。通过削弱装甲，军舰上可以装备的武器大大增多。

original: Despite new efforts at treaties, refitting lighter cruisers with heavier weaponry remains efficient, although armor is still limited.
translation: 虽然人们在条约中做了很多努力，但是在轻巡洋舰上装备更重的武器仍然是一种很有效的方法，尽管装甲依然十分贫弱。

original: As restrictions are increasingly ignored worldwide, more balanced heavy cruiser designs with more priority on armor can be built. Better anti-air guns allow these ships to cooperate in naval air warfare.
translation: 由于越来越多的国家开始无视条约的限制，人们现在可以建造装甲更重更平衡的重巡洋舰了。更好的防空武器能使它们在对空战斗中发挥更大的作用。

original: Upscaled, longer and heavier designs with rapid-fire armaments are features in these final stages of heavy cruiser development.
translation: 这些重巡洋舰的最终型号往往更长、更大也更重，它们还装备有高射速的速射武器。

original: The post-war battlecruiser arms race resulted in several heavily armed designs, sacrificing armor for speed compared to battleships.
translation: 一战之后战列巡洋舰的火力竞赛催生出了几种火力强大，牺牲了装甲来获得相对战列舰的航速优势的设计。

original: Rebuilt and repurposed battlecruisers continue to outrun even modern battleship designs by lighter protection, but have developed better systems for fire control, detection and aerial defenses.
translation: 为了保持对现代战列舰的速度优势，改进并且重新定位后的战列巡洋舰装甲更加贫弱，但它们现在拥有了更好的火控、索敌以及对空防御系统。

original: Considered by some to be a relic of a bygone era of naval warfare, by others as the most impressive ships ever built, no one can deny that these remnants of the battleship arms race constitute some of the most heavily armed and armored vessels ever built.
translation: 虽然有些人认为战列舰是属于过去的海战的古董，但是另一些人认为它们是人类有史以来最令人印象深刻的舰船。没有人会否认这些战列舰竞赛的遗物是人们建造过的火力最强大、装甲最坚实的军舰。

original: With improved stability and range, a new generation of battleships improve upon previous designs while remaining within limits stipulated by naval treaties.
translation: 在不打破海军条约限制的前提下，新一代的战列舰与之前的设计相比拥有更好的稳定性以及更远的航程。

original: Thicker armor, stronger engines, a battery of high-caliber guns and improved anti-air capabilities can allow battleships to remain relevant, if correctly employed, in a world where naval warfare is increasingly dominated by aerial support.
translation: 只要使用得当，拥有更厚的装甲，更强劲的引擎，大口径的火炮以及更强的防空能力的战列舰在空军慢慢变成主角的海战中仍可找到自己的一席之地。

original: As the world sees what may be the last major battleship confrontations, the importance of heavy armaments and anti-air turrets is greater than ever.
translation: 各国海军都在思考战列舰还会面对什么重大威胁。最终，人们发现强大的武装和防空火力显得比从前任何时候都更为重要。

original: Many military theorists believe that naval aviation is the future. Converting old capital ships and ocean liners to carry aircraft will be the first step towards utilizing these new doctrines.
translation: 很多军事理论家相信未来是属于海军航空兵的。老旧的主力舰以及邮船改装的航空母舰将是这些新理论的第一个试验场。

original: As work begins on the first keel-up carrier designs, we must ensure that these ships have the range and speed to keep up with the rest of our navy, while respecting the post-war naval treaties.
translation: 第一种专用航空母舰的设计工作开始了，我们必须确保这种航空母舰在不违反海军条约的前提下，有足够远的航程和足够快的速度来跟上舰队中其他的军舰。

original: Improved construction methods and more specialized systems like deck edge elevators allow these carriers to transport more planes more efficiently.
translation: 改进的建造方式以及诸如甲板边升降机这类的更加专业的系统使这些航空母舰可以更高效的携带更多飞机。

original: With many naval treaties now increasingly ignored, we can proceed to build carriers capable of transporting more planes than ever to secure air superiority cover.
translation: 随着海军条约被越来越多的国家所无视，我们现在可以建造能携带前所未有的数量的飞机来确保制空权的航空母舰了。

original: The current state of the world no longer has any room for abiding by naval treaties. Without these limitations, we can focus entirely on creating the heaviest, most well-armed battleships of all time, able to engage multiple lesser vessels.
translation: 在当前的世界形势下遵守海军条约已经变得完全没有必要了。挣脱了种种限制之后，我们现在可以全心全意地建造能同时对付数艘较小敌舰的、有史以来最重并且装备最优良的战列舰。

original: An improvement on our earlier super heavy design with stronger weapons and improved fire control systems.
translation: 我们在之前的超重战列舰上装上了更强大的武器以及改装过的火控系统。

original: The L-class were medium sized boats originally planned under the Emergency War Program as an improved version of the previous submarine classes. They were built in the late stages of World War I and were equipped with new, larger 21 in. torpedoes. They served until the beginning of World War II when they were mostly used for secondary and training duties.
translation: L级中型潜艇原本是紧急战争计划下的一艘前潜水艇的改进版本。它们都在第一次世界大战后期建造，并配备了新的更大的21英寸鱼雷。它们一直服役到第二次世界大战开始时，主要是进行培训和辅助任务。

original: The To-class or Triton-class boats were designed to replace the O, P, and R class large submarines. They were moderately large submarines with long range well-suited for the Atlantic and Pacific Ocean. These boats were well-armed, stable platforms and were used extensively during the conflict, as 25 percent of the constructed boats were lost during the war.
translation: T级或特里同级是被设计用来取代O、P或R级的大型潜艇。它们合适的设计使其非常适合大西洋和太平洋等远程作战。这些船只全副武装，拥有稳定的平台，被广泛的应用于战争中。并且于战争中失去了25%的所建造的船只。

original: The U class were small-sized submarines built under the War Emergency 1940 and 1941 Programs. Originally designed as training submarines as the war broke out, the design changed, allowing these submarines to prove useful in the confined waters of the North Sea and the Mediterranean. Due to their smaller size, their range and the weaponry were limited. Three subclasses made up the class: Undine, Umpire and Uproar.
translation: U级是在战事紧急的1940-1941年计划建造的小型潜艇。最初的设计为训练潜艇，随着战争的爆发而改变设计，允许这些潜艇承受北海和地中海的水压。由于其规模较小，使得其所使用的武器被限制。该级有三个子级：温蒂妮级、安培尔级和喧嚣级。

original: The V-class or Vampire-class submarines were based on the previous U-class smaller sized boats. They were larger but still relatively small, with better seagoing ability but limited operational range and weaponry.
translation: V级或吸血鬼级是基于以前的U级所设计的小尺寸潜艇。它们比前者要大，但还是较小。它们有着更好的航海能力，但航行范围和武器却比较有限。

original: These destroyers included the Admirality and Thornycroft V and W classes. They were built under the War Emergency Program. They were the ultimate evolution of British destroyer design during the First World War, embodying the improvements of their predecessors as well as new technological advances. Large numbers of these ships were built during the late stages of WWI and became the backbone of the Royal Navy's destroyer flotillas afterwards. Beginning in the 1930s, they were placed into reserve fleets, used eventually relegated to convoy escort duties. They were adequately-armed, fast vessels with good range.
translation: 这些驱逐舰包括海军部级、桑尼克罗夫特级、V和W级，它们是在紧急战争计划下建造的。它们是英国驱逐舰在第一次世界大战的终极进化。它们体现了他们前辈的能力，并加以了新技术的改进。这些舰只在第一次世界大战后期大量建成，之后成为了皇家海军驱逐舰队的中坚力量。20世纪30年代，它们被转入后备舰队，降为进行护航任务。它们装备精良，航行快速并具有良好的航行范围。

original: The G, H, and I class destroyers were ordered as part of the 1933 and 1934 Naval Construction Programs. They were generally repeats of the preceding F class, with a slight reduction in size. Armament in the G and H classes is the same as in the F class, with both using the 4.7 in. guns. These ships had long range, were adequately armed, and had a strong torpedo complement. They were used extensively during the war and suffered numerous losses.
translation: G、H和I级驱逐舰是1933年和1934年海军建设计划一部分。它们一般沿袭之前的F级，有轻微的减小尺寸。武器与G、H以及一些F级是一样的，都装备4.7英寸火炮。这些船只射程远，装备精良，补充有很强的鱼雷。它们在战争中被广泛的使用，但也遭受了大量的损失。

original: The J, K, and N classes were similar to the earlier Tribal class but rather than emphasizing gun armament, the designers returned to a more standard heavy torpedo and lighter gun setup. The ships were modified throughout their wartime service. Upgrades included improved anti-aircraft guns and radar. They were fast, long-ranged and well-armed vessels ideal for fleet escorts.
translation: J、K和N级类似于早期的部落级驱逐舰，但重心不在火炮，设计师将重心转变到了重型鱼雷和轻型火炮。它们在战时进行了改装，升级和改进包括高射炮和雷达。它们快速且长远的航程以及装备精良的武器使其成为了护航舰队的理想选择。

original: The Battle class destroyers built upon the evolution of British destroyers used throughout the war The ships were ordered as part of the 1942 and 1943 Naval Programs. They were well-armed in terms of both their guns and their torpedoes. Their AA armament ASW capabilities, speed, and range made them versatile vessels. Their late introduction to the war led to a minimal contribution.
translation: 战斗级建造在英国驱逐舰在战争中演变的中期。这艘军舰是1942年和1943年海军计划的一部分。它们装备有精良的舰炮和鱼雷，优秀的防空武器，反潜能力，航行速度和航行范围使它可兼具多种用途。但由于它们出现的过晚而导致其对战争的贡献微乎其微。

original: C-class light cruisers were a group of light cruisers built before and during the First World War for the rough conditions of the North Sea. They proved to be rugged and capable vessels despite being somewhat small and cramped. Their armament was more than satisfactory, as they carried enough 6 in. guns to fight enemy surface targets and a heavy torpedo load to finish off enemy vessels and convoys. They saw extensive use during WWI and participated in many surface actions.
translation: C级轻巡洋舰是第一次世界大战期间为适应北海的恶劣条件所建造的。它们被证明是坚固耐用的，尽管其船体很小而且很狭窄，但它的武器还是令人满意的。因为它携带有6英寸火炮来打击敌水面目标，并装备有重型鱼雷来击沉敌人的护航船只。它们被广泛的应用于第一次世界大战中，并参与了很多行动。

original: The Southampton-class light cruisers were a subclass of the Town-class cruisers and were designed to counter the Japanese Mogami-class cruisers. These vessels were well-armored, had good speed and range, and carried a formidable armament of twelve 6 in. guns in four triple turrets. They were the basis for many of the subsequent RN wartime light cruiser designs.
translation: 南安普顿级轻巡洋舰是城级轻巡洋舰的一个子级，是为应付日本的最上级巡洋舰而设计建造的。这些船只有很好的装甲，良好的航行速度和范围，并在4座三联装炮塔上安了12英寸舰炮。它们为皇家海军后续的许多战时轻巡洋舰的设计奠定了基础。

original: The Crown Colony-class light cruisers were improved versions of the earlier Town class but with a simplified design to speed up construction and reduce costs. The ships carried the same guns as their predecessors, four triple turrets housing 6 in. guns. They were similarly armored but because of their smaller engines, their range is somewhat reduced. The type included two subclasses: Fiji and Ceylon.
translation: 殖民地级轻巡洋舰是城级的早期改良版本但简化了设计，加快了建造时间和建设成本。该舰沿袭了它们的前辈一样的武器，装备4座三联装6英寸舰炮。它们还装备了一样的装甲但更小的发动机，使其航行范围有所减小。该级有两个子级：斐济级和锡兰级。

original: Also known as the Swiftsure class, these cruisers were designed as a modified version of the Crown Colony class, incorporating war modifications that were authorized in 1941. They had a longer operational range and more numerous AA weaponry than the Crown Colony class, while the main armament was reduced to three triple turrets. Built too late to affect the outcome of the war, most of the ordered vessels were cancelled afterwards.
translation: 也被称为确捷级，这些巡洋舰的设计为殖民地级的一个改良版本。在战争的1941年完成改进。它们有比殖民地级更长的航行范围和更多的防空武器，而主要武器则减为3座三联装炮塔。由于开工的太晚而不足以影响战争的结果，大多数工程都被取消。

original: The Hawkins-class cruisers were the first heavy cruisers in the world. They were based on the earlier Town-class light cruisers, particularly the Birmingham subclass, but equipped with 7.5 in. guns and a thicker armor belt. They were designed to fight the large convoy raiders of Germany. They were well-armed, had reasonable speed and range, and good protection. Altogether, five ships were commissioned but only four were active at the start of WWII.
translation: 霍金斯级巡洋舰是世界上第一艘重型巡洋舰。它们基于早期的城级巡洋舰，特别是子级伯明翰级而来，但装备了7.5英寸舰炮和更厚的装甲。它们被用来对付德国的大型护航舰队。它们拥有合适的航行速度和范围以及良好的保护。总共订制了五艘但只有四艘活跃于第二次世界大战中。

original: The Surrey-class heavy cruisers were proposed under the 1928 Naval Program. They were improved versions of the earlier York-class heavy cruisers. Had they been completed, they had been equipped with four twin 8 in. gun turrets, heavier armor, and more powerful engines. Two ships were ordered but none were laid down.
translation: 萨里级重巡洋舰是根据1928年的海军计划所提出的。它们是早期的约克级重巡洋舰的改进版本。如果它们完成，它们将装备四座双联装8英寸炮塔，更重的装甲和更强大的引擎。总共有两艘船被订制，但并没有建造。

original: The Admiral-class heavy cruisers (not to be confused with the Admiral-class battlecruisers) were the Royal Navy's last attempt to design and build cruisers armed with 8 in. guns. Design studies started in 1938 and ended in 1941, resulting in various proposals. The final proposals featured new 8 in. guns in triple turrets, a heavy AA armament, thick armor, and good speed. A lack of enemy cruisers and the cost efficiency of these vessels resulted in a focus on building more light cruisers instead.
translation: 海军上将级重巡洋舰（不要与海军上将级巡洋舰混淆）是皇家海军最后一次尝试建造装备有8英寸舰炮的巡洋舰。设计研究开始于1938年，终止于1941年。期间有各种各样的建议，最后的建议是装备新的三联装8英寸炮塔，重型的防空武器，厚重的装甲以及维持良好的航行速度。由于缺乏相应的敌人和这些船体导致的成本，使重心转变为了建设更多的轻巡洋舰。

original: These ships were proposed by Sir Winston Churchill, Lord of the Admirality, in the early stages of WWII to counter the German Deutschland class big gun cruisers. These vessels had 9.2 in. cannons, heavy AA, and strong armor. They were designed to effectively battle the enemy capital ships. The ships were eventually cancelled because of high costs and a lack of demand for a new heavy cruiser.
translation: 这些设计是由温斯顿·丘吉尔爵士于海军部所提出的，为在二战的早期阶段应对德国的德意志兰级战列巡洋舰。这些船只装备有9.2英寸舰炮，重型防空武器和强大的装甲。它们是为了有效地打击敌人的主力舰。这些设计最终由于高昂的成本和对新型重巡洋舰需求的缺乏而取消。

original: The Renown-class battlecruisers were originally laid down as improved versions of the Revenge-class battleships. Their construction was suspended at the outbreak of WWI. Admiral Lord Fisher managed to restart their construction as battlecruisers. These ships were the quintessential battlecruiser. They were well-armed, fast, and maneuverable, but had thinner armor and a shorter operational range. Only two of the original three ships, Repulse and Renown, were completed.
translation: 声望级战列巡洋舰的最初设计是改进自复仇级战列舰。它们的建设由于第一次世界大战的爆发而中断。海军上将费舍尔勋爵设法重新启动了它们作为战列巡洋舰的建设。这些舰只是典型的战列舰。它们装备精良，快速且容易操作，但装甲更薄且航行范围更短。最初有三艘船，但只有声望和反击两艘船最终完成。

original: The Princess Royal is a class of hypothetical battlecruisers that were a faster and cheaper version of the King George V-class battleships. These vessels carried a similar but reduced armament for both surface and anti-air combat: two triple 14 in. cannons and six twin 5.25 in. AA guns. Their fast speed and long range would provide the Royal Navy quick strike capabilities and convoy protection, but their limited armor would prove problematic if they had to fight modern battleships.
translation: 皇家公主级是一种假象的战列巡洋舰，是更快、更便宜版本的乔治五世国王级战列舰。这些船只进行了类似但缩减了主武器及防空武器的装备：2座三联装14英寸炮塔和6个5.25英寸防空炮。它们速度快、射程远都将成为皇家海军快速打击能力和护航舰队的保障，但它们有限的装甲将证明如果让它们对抗现代战舰将是成问题的。

original: The Revenge-class battleships were ordered in 1913 as cheap versions of the Queen Elizabeth-class fast dreadnoughts. While similarly armed and armored, their considerably lower speed relegated them to secondary duties during WWII. Of the envisioned 8 ships of the class, only 5 were finished.
translation: 复仇级战列舰是1913年作为伊丽莎白女王级高速战列舰的廉价翻版订购的。有着同样的护甲和火炮，他们的速度大幅下降让他们只能执行二战时的二线任务。在最初8艘订单中，只有5艘完工。

original: The King George V-class battleships were the result of the 1922 Washington and 1930 First London Naval Treaties which limited the maximum displacement and gunnery of capital ships. As such, these ships were equipped with smaller-caliber cannons than earlier and even contemporary battleships. Despite the smaller caliber, the ships were adequately armed, carried strong AA weaponry, and had adequate protection. Five ships were ordered and laid down as replacement for the old Queen Elizabeth Class battleships.
translation: 乔治五世国王级战列舰是在1922年《华盛顿条约》和1930年《伦敦条约》签订的背景下被极大限度的限制了排水量与火力所建造出来的主力舰。因此，这些船只比当时的其他船只配备了更小口径的舰炮。尽管规模口径较小，但是船只还是被充分的武装，配备有强有力的防空武器和足够的防护。该级总共建造了五艘船只被用以替代旧型的伊丽莎白女王级战列舰。

original: The Lion-class battleships were the follow-up class to King George V battleships, incorporating many of their features. Six ships were ordered in the 1938 Naval Program to replace the aging Revenge-class battleships but none were finished due to the erupting hostilities. The vessels would have been general similar to the King George-class, but the main armament would be heavier, introducing a new 16 in. cannon. They would also have had thicker armor and more powerful engines.
translation: 狮级战列舰是乔治五世国王级战列舰的次级战舰，并保有了许多他的特点。海军在1938年计划建造六艘船来替代旧型的复仇级战列舰，但由于没有爆发敌对冲突所以并没有完成。该级战列舰与乔治五世国王级相似但引进了更强大的主武器，一种新的16英寸火炮，并且它还拥有更强大的引擎和更厚的装甲。

original: The Vanguard-class battleship was the last battleship to be built for the Royal Navy. A single ship was ordered but four more were considered for the Pacific theater. Ordered under the 1940 Emergency War Program, construction did not gain a high priority and was finished after the war. The class had a sleek hull, giving excellent stability and seaworthiness. The armament is the same as the Queen Elizabeth and Revenge class battleships, providing considerable firepower. Strong engines and good armor made the vessel fast and well protected.
translation: 前卫级战列舰是皇家海军最后建造的战列舰。皇家海军认为需要在太平洋战区投入四艘该级战列舰，但最后却只订制了一艘。且根据1940年的紧急战争计划，没有对其进行优先建造，使得其直到战争结束后才完成。前卫有一个光滑的船体，这给了它优秀的稳定性和适航性。武器与伊丽莎白女王级和复仇级一样，为其提供了相当大的火力。而它强大的引擎和良好的装甲也为其提供了优秀的速度与防护。

original: The Centurion is a class of hypothetical heavy battleships of the Royal Navy built to counter the large vessels of the German and Japanese navies. Large 18 in. guns and thick armor provide the ship with the necessary firepower and protection to battle these vessels. Strong AA armament, long range, and good speed were a necessity to cover the vast seas of the British Empire.
translation: 百夫长级是皇家海军假象的一艘用以对抗德国和日本海军的重型战舰。18英寸的火炮和厚装甲为其提供了必要的火力并能很好的保护他的船体。强大的防空武器、超远的射程和良好的速度使得它成为大英帝国为保卫他庞大的海洋所必备的。

original: The Lion II class battleships were designed in 1944 as an improved version of the earlier Lion-class battleship. Incorporating wartime lessons, this design was larger and heavier, and if completed, would carry either three or four triple 16 in. guns of the latest type. Thick armor plates protected the ship from any surface or aerial foe. The cost to build these ships, the defeat of enemy navies, and the need for aircraft carriers resulted in the abandonment of the project.
translation: 狮II级战列舰的设计来自于在1944年对早期狮级战列舰的一个改进版本。由于汲取了战时的经验教训，这种设计变得越来越庞大与沉重。如果该舰完成了，它将会配备三或四个最新型的16英寸火炮，厚钢板装甲保护船只抵御从任何方向甚至空中敌人的进攻。但由于需要庞大的成本来建设这些船只，以及对航空母舰需求量的上升，导致该项目最终被放弃。

original: These three aircraft carriers were converted battlecruisers and were the first fleet carriers of the Royal Navy. Their conversion was the result of the Washington Naval Treaty of 1922 and the work was finished in 1925. They were moderately-armored but well-armed vessels, with long range and good speed, but due to the nature of the conversion their aircraft complement is limited. Nonetheless, they gave the Royal Navy important experience in aircraft carrier construction and fleet air projection.
translation: 这三艘航空母舰是由巡洋舰改装而来，是皇家海军的第一批航空母舰。它们是1922年《华盛顿条约》的产物并于1925年完工。它们的装甲受到了限制但装备精良且拥有持久和良好的速度。但是由于其性质的限制，导致它们只能有限的补充和输送飞机。尽管如此，它们还是给予了皇家海军舰队建设航空母舰的重要经验。

original: The Ark Royal aircraft carrier was the first such vessel to be built to fit the restrictions of the Washington Naval Treaty. She is the first ship on which the hangars and flight deck were an integral part of the hull. Designed in 1934, the vessel is well-armored and armed. It carried a large complement of aircraft and had adequate operational range and speed to keep up with the major forces of the Royal Navy.
translation: 皇家方舟级是第一批以适应《华盛顿条约》的限制来建造的航空母舰。她是第一个采用将机库和飞行甲板作为船体一部分设计的航空母舰。 1934年的设计中，这艘船拥有良好的装甲和武器。它还能携带大量的飞机，并有足够的航行范围和速度来跟上皇家海军的主力。

original: The Illustrious class was designed within the restrictions of the Second London Naval Treaty of 1936, which limited carrier size to an upper limit of 23,000 tons. She was the first British carrier to have an armored flight deck, which reduced its air group size. Heavy armor and AA weaponry provided a strong defense for the ships, while powerful engines and a large fuel store gave the ships long operational range.
translation: 光辉级的设计限制于第二次《伦敦条约》，使其排水量限制于有效上限23,000吨。她是英国第一个拥有装甲飞行甲板的航空母舰，但这减少了其输送舰载机的能力。重型的装甲和防空武器为船只提供了强大的防御，而强大的引擎和大型燃料库也为其提供了长的航行范围。

original: The Implacable-class aircraft carriers were ordered under the 1938 Naval Program and were essentially improved versions of the earlier Illustrious class. The war and the shift of priority to smaller vessels for convoy protection duties in the early and middle stages of the war slowed the constriction of these vessels. They were larger vessels able to carry more planes while maintaining thick armor on both the hull and flight deck. More powerful engines gave it greater speed and operational range compared to the Illustrious class.
translation: 怨仇级航空母舰是在根据1938年海军计划的要求上进行建设的，但其本质还是光辉级早些时候的改进版本。随着战争的进行和时间的推移，其职责转变为保护护航任务的船只和减少这些船只的损失。它们更大的船体使其能携带更多的飞机，同时也保持了其在船体和飞行甲板上都覆盖了厚厚的装甲。而更强大的发动机也给了它比光辉级更大的速度和航行范围。

original: The 600-ton Series of submarines were France's first modern post WWI submarines. They were medium sized, displacing around 600tons. Though they were seagoing ones, they were designated as coastal submarines and used mostly in warm waters of the Mediterranean. Three classes of 4 ships each built of this type: Sirène, Ariane and Circé classes. They were the basis of the bigger 630-ton Series the Argonaute, Diane and Orion classes.
translation: 600吨系列潜艇是法国第一批后一战潜艇，体型中等，排水量约600吨。尽管属于远洋型号，她们还是被定位为近海潜艇，基本上都在地中海的暖水区执勤。这一系列共有四艘潜艇，分属三个不同型号：海妖级、阿里亚尼级和女妖级。她们也是更大型的630吨系列亚尔古水手级、罗马月神级和猎户座级的原型。

original: The Minerve-class submarines (project name T2) were based on the 630-ton Series though they had better engines and different torpedo layout. These submarines were the first part of the standardization program resulting of a centralized design of the DCAN (Direction des Constructions et Armes Navale) rather than shipyard specific designs of the previous classes.
translation: 密涅瓦级潜艇（项目代号T2）基于630吨系列设计制造，拥有更好的引擎和鱼雷管阵列。不同于之前各级基于造船厂进行的特定设计，这些潜艇是由DCAN（海军装备制造管理局）进行集中设计的第一批标准化计划的产物。

original: The Roland Morillot-class submarines (Project name Z2) were large ocean going submarines based on the earlier Redoubtable-class submarines. They were large submarines displacing 1,800-2,400 tons and carried a formidable armament of 10 torpedo tubes. The Fall of France occurred before any were finished.
translation: 罗兰·莫里约级潜艇（项目代号Z2）是一种大型远洋潜艇，基于早期的敬畏级设计制造。其排水量为1800-2400吨，携带有由十枚鱼雷发射管组成的强大主武器系统，但在法国沦陷前其尚未完工。

original: The Phénix-class submarines were medium sized ocean-going and long range boats authorized in the 1939-40 naval programs but the start of the war and the Fall of France resulted in the cancellation of these boats. They were similar to the Redoutable class though they were smaller and displaced 1,200 tons. They carried a similarly heavy torpedo armament.
translation: 菲尼克斯级潜艇是中型的远洋型大作战半径舰只，于1939-1940年的海军项目中被批准，但战争的爆发与法国的沦陷导致其被迫取消。其设计方案与敬畏级类似，但体型更小，排水量1200吨，携带有类似的重型鱼雷武器。

original: The Bourrasque-class destroyers were part of the 1,500-ton Series, and launched in the mid 1920's. Together with the preceding Chacal and following L'Adroit classes, they were the backbone of the new modern post war French fleet. They were fast and well-armed for their time, but their torpedo armament is smaller compared to similar vessels in the other navies.
translation: 狂风级驱逐舰是1500吨系列的组成部分，于20世纪20年代中期下水。她们与之前的胡狼级及之后的灵巧级一同构成了战后法国新舰队的骨干。就当时而言，这一型号速度很快，武装精良，但相较于别国海军类似型号的舰只，其鱼雷型号略小。

original: The Le Fantasque-class destroyers were essentially improved versions of the earlier super destroyers of the 2,400-ton Series (Guépard, Aigle, Vauquelin) built under the 1930 naval program. They were large, heavily-armed, and very fast destroyers, perfect for escorting the new high speed units of the French fleet. Their armament consisted of newly developed guns, adequate AA, and torpedo armament.
translation: 空想级驱逐舰本质上是早期的特大型驱逐舰2400吨系列（猎豹级，雄鹰级，沃克兰级）的改进型，于1930年的海军项目中制造。她们体型庞大，装备有重型武器，而且航速很快，非常适合承担法国舰队中新型高速舰的护卫任务。其武器系统包括有最新的改进型火炮，充足的防空设施和鱼雷发射管。

original: The L'Intrépide-class destroyers ware a modified version of the earlier Le Hardi class destroyers. They were authorized in the 1938 and 1939 naval programs but the war and Fall of France resulted in the cancellation of these vessels. They would have been focused more on an anti-aircraft role, and had an increase in displacement to 2,800-2,900 tons had larger engines.
translation: 勇猛级驱逐舰是大胆级驱逐舰的改进型，于1938年和1939年的海军项目中被授权开发，但战争的爆发和法国的沦陷导致其被迫取消。勇猛级的设计思路更倾向于防空角色，排水量将增加至2800-2900吨，并拥有更大马力的引擎。

original: The Hoche and Bayard classes were the final super destroyer design of the French Navy. Both classes were based on the Mogador class, displacing 4,200 tons with a similar main armament but improved AA guns and stronger engines. They were authorized in the 1939-40 naval programs but the start of the war and the Fall of France resulted in the cancellation of these ships.
translation: 奥什级和贝亚德是法国海军的终极特大型驱逐舰设计方案，两者都基于莫加多尔级设计，排水量4200吨，装备有类似的主武器和改良的防空炮及更为强大的引擎。她们在1939-40年的海军项目中被批准，但战争的爆发和法国的沦陷导致其被迫取消。

original: The Duguay-Trouin light cruisers were the first major French warships built after World War I in the 1922 naval program. They became the first light cruisers with super-firing enclosed main turrets. Among light cruisers, they had a strong torpedo armament but virtually nonexistent armor.
translation: 迪盖-特鲁安级轻巡洋舰于1922年的海军计划中建造，是一战后法国第一批主力战舰，也是第一批使用背负式封闭炮塔作为主炮的战舰。作为请巡洋舰而言，迪盖-特鲁安级拥有强大的鱼雷武器，但几乎没有装甲。

original: The La Galissonnière-class light cruisers were the answer to the Italian Condottieri type light cruisers and were based on the previous Emile Bertin class. They were built in the 1931 and 1932 naval programs, with typical main armament and adequate AA armament of the era. They displaced 10,850 tons, had an increased amount of scout planes, and had good speed.
translation: 为了应对意大利的驱逐领舰型轻巡洋舰，法国基于埃米尔·贝尔坦级设计制造了拉·加利索尼埃级轻巡洋舰。这一型号于1931年和1932年的海军计划中建造，装备有标准型的主武器及防空武器。其排水量为10850吨，配有额外增加的侦察机，拥有良好的速度。

original: The DeGrasse-class cruisers were authorized in the 1938 and 1939 naval programs and were essentially improved La Galissonnières. They had stronger AA armament as well as bigger engines. The Fall of France caused the last two ships to be cancelled and the lead ship to be finished post-war as a different design. The Germans intended to finish her as a light carrier but this project was also not carried out.
translation: 作为拉·加利索尼埃级的改进型，德格拉斯级巡洋舰在1938年和1939年的海军计划中批准建造。这一型号拥有更强大的防空武器和更大的引擎。法国的沦陷导致最后两艘同级舰被取消，而其一号舰则在战后以不同的设计方案完工。德军本打算将其作为轻巡洋舰继续建造，但最终未能成行。

original: The Colbert was an anti-aircraft light cruiser launched in 1956. This Colbert-class cruiser was built in a very similar way to the post-war De Grasse, featuring heavy AA armament both for long and short ranges. The difference between Colbert and DeGrasse is that the Colbert had smaller engines, thinner armor, and was slightly smaller.
translation: 柯尔贝尔号是一艘对空型轻巡洋舰，于1956年下水，其建造方式很类似战后完工的德格拉斯级，以强大的远近防空火力为特色。与德格拉斯级不同，柯尔贝尔级的引擎较小，装甲更为轻薄，体型也稍有些小。

original: The Suffren-class heavy cruisers were basically a repeat of the previous Duquesne class with minor improvements regarding its seagoing abilities. Both classes resembled the contemporary cruiser philosophy of the French navy; very thin armor but good speed and range. Their standard displacement is 10,000 tons and they were equipped with armaments that were standard for a heavy cruiser.
translation: 絮弗伦级重巡洋舰基本上延续了迪肯斯纳级的设计，仅仅进行了一些微调以提高其远洋作战的能力。这两个型号都彰显了类似于法国海军当时在轻巡洋舰方面的思路。气标准排水量为10000吨，装备有标准的重巡洋舰型武器。

original: The Algérie-class heavy cruiser were a further improvement of the previous classes of the Suffren and Duquesne but designed to be the opponent of the new Italian heavy cruisers of the Zara class. Both the main armor belt and underwater protection is considerably increased. Its AA armament is adequate for its time, but due to these changes, the standard displacement is over 10,000 tons.
translation: 阿尔及利亚级重巡洋舰是絮弗伦级和迪肯斯纳级的增强改进型号，被作为意大利新型重巡洋舰扎拉级的对手而设计完成。这一型号主装甲带和水下防护都得到了显著的提升，但也因此导致其标准排水量超过了10000吨。

original: The Saint Louis-class heavy cruisers were based on the Algérie class but the overall look was closer to that of the Dunkerque and Richelieu class capital ships. Three ships were ordered in the 1940 naval program, but due to the Fall of France none of them were laid down. They would field new guns and improved AA armament but the armor would be the same as on the Algérie class. It was the last heavy cruiser design of the French Navy.
translation: 圣路易斯级重巡洋舰基于阿尔及利亚级设计建造，但整体外观更接近于敦刻尔克级和黎塞留级主力舰。三艘船于1940年的海军计划中被订购，但由于法国的沦陷，全部未能建造。圣路易斯级计划列装新型火炮和改进型防空武器，装备与阿尔及利亚级相同的装甲。这也是法国海军的最后一款重巡洋舰设计方案。

original: The Forbin-class heavy cruisers were a hypothetical design as a follow up of the Saint Louis class. Designed to defend the trade lanes between Mainland France and the colonies, it had long range and good speed along with a heavy armament of guns in four triple turrets and an adequate number of AA weaponry. The ship layout and general look resembled an influence from the previous Saint Louis class as well as British Crown Colony class.
translation: 福尔班级重巡洋舰是一款继承圣路易斯级的巡洋舰构想，用于保护法国本土与各殖民地间的贸易航线。这一型号具备优秀的作战半径和航速，装备由四座三联装炮塔组建的重型火力及数量众多的防空炮。福尔班级的设计布局和大体外观体现出类似圣路易斯级和英国殖民地级的影响。

original: The Durand-Viel design of battlecruiser was a proposal among a series of studies dating back to WWI. They were essentially the battlecruiser versions of the Normandie and Lyon classes of battleship featuring the same quad turrets and guns though in reduced number. Like contemporary battlecruisers of other navies, they would be faster but less armored than a battleship. They were cancelled before WWI broke out.
translation: 战列巡洋舰迪朗-维尔式设计是基于一系列最早可以追溯至一战的研究而提出的，其本质上是诺曼底级和里昂级战列舰的战列巡洋舰版本，装备有同样的四联装主炮，但火炮数量有所减少。和同时代其他国家的战列巡洋舰类似，这种战舰速度更快，但装甲比战列舰轻薄。这一方案最终在一战爆发前被取消。

original: The Dunkerques were designed to counter the German Deutschland-class pocket battleships. They were the apex of a series design studies from the mid 1920's to early 1930's. Authorized in the 1931 and 1934 naval programs, they were similar to the British Nelson-class battleships, with all of their main turrets concentrated forward. This resulted in a shorter belt armor and thus a smaller ship to fit into the Naval Treaties limitations.
translation: 敦刻尔克级被设计用于对抗德国的德意志级袖珍战列舰，是自20世纪20年代中期至30年代早期的一系列设计研究的集大成者，在1931年和1934年的海军项目中获得批准。类似于英国的纳尔逊级战列舰，敦刻尔克级全部的主炮塔都被集中于前甲板，这一设计缩短了其侧线装甲，减小了舰只吨位使其得以符合华盛顿海军条约的限制。

original: The Courbet-class battleships were the first super-dreadnoughts built for the French Navy before and during the First World War. Authorized in the 1910 and 1911 naval programs, they saw limited service during World War I, but were active during WW2. Though they had thicker armor and stronger guns than the previous Dante class battleships, they were still inferior to contemporary USN and RN battleships. They displaced just over 22,000 tons and their only modernizations before WW2 were an improved AA armament and improved boilers.
translation: 科尔贝级战列舰是法国海军的第一批超无畏舰，在一战战前和期间都有建造。这一型号于1910年和1911年的海军项目中获得批准，在一战期间战果寥寥，但在二战期间大为活跃。相较于其之前的但丁级，科尔贝级拥有更厚的装甲和更强大的火炮，但依旧落后于同时期的美国和英国海军战列舰。其排水量近22000吨，于二战前进行了防空武器和锅炉的现代化改造。

original: The Richelieu-class battleships were the last battleships commissioned into the French Navy. They were an improved design of the Dunkerque and authorized under the 1935 and 1938 naval programs. They had excellent AA armament, speed and range, which made it an excellent capital ship. Out of the four ordered, only two were launched and one was completed before the Fall of France. There were numerous attempts to finish the remaining ships using different designs, proposed for use as anti-aircraft battleships, battleship-carrier hybrids, or full scale carriers.
translation: 黎塞留级战列舰是服役于法国海军的最后一批战列舰。这一型号是敦刻尔克级的改进型，在1935年和1938年的海军计划中获批，拥有出色的防空火力、速度和作战半径，使得其成为一种性能极为卓越的主力舰。在订购的全部四艘中，仅有两艘得以下水，其中一艘在法国沦陷前完工。政府曾作出大量尝试以完成剩余的几艘船，使用了不同的设计方案，试图将其改做防空战舰、航空战舰或者正规航母。

original: The Gascogne class of battleships were a subclass of the Richelieu class. Three ships were ordered in the 1940 naval program but none were started. The design would be a repeat of the Richelieu, but with the main armament distributed evenly fore and aft, improved AA Armament, and improved engines resulting in an overall better ship.
translation: 加斯科涅级战列舰是黎塞留级的一个亚级，全部三艘都在1940年订购但无一开工。这一型号基本延续了黎塞留级的设计，但主炮均匀分布于前后甲板，防空武器和引擎都得到了升级，这也使得其综合性能得到了一定的提升。

original: The Alsace-class battleships were planned to succeed the Richelieu class. Four ships were ordered, with the design studies finished in 1939, authorized in 1940, and expected to be laid down in 1941, though the Fall of France prevented this from happening. It improves upon the Richelieu design with heavier and more numerous main guns, stronger AA armament, thicker armor plates, and larger engines.
translation: 阿尔萨斯级被计划作为黎塞留级的继任者，全部四艘于1939年完成设计研究，1940年批准并计划于1941年开工，但法国的沦陷使这一切成为泡影。这一型号在黎塞留级的基础上进行了改进，配备了更大更多的主炮，更强大的防空装备，更厚的装甲以及更大马力的引擎。

original: The Charlemagne class of super battleships is a hypothetical design to match the big battleships of other navies. They feature a heavy armament all forward in superfiring positions, heavy AA armament, and thick armor. The entire design borrows elements from the Richelieu and British Nelson classes.
translation: 查理曼级战列舰是法国海军为对抗别国大型战列舰而提出的设计构想，主要特点为全部部署于前甲板的重型背负式主炮，强大的防空火力及厚重的装甲，整体设计借鉴了黎塞留级和英国纳尔逊级的元素。

original: The Napoléon Bonaparte-class battleships were a hypothetical design and based on the Alsace and Gascogne classes. Its heavy armament is distributed evenly fore and aft in triple turrets, with superfiring secondaries and heavy AA armament. Thick armor and strong engines provide the speed and defense needed to keep up with the other ships in the fleet and effectively battle its adversaries.
translation: 拿破仑·波拿巴级战列舰是一种基于阿尔萨斯级和加斯科涅级进行改进的设计构想，计划安装三联装二级背负式炮塔作为主武器，采用前后甲板平均分布，并配备有重型防空火力。厚重的装甲与强大的引擎能提供必要的速度和防御，使其能够与舰队中其他船只保持连携，并能够有效创伤敌军。

original: The Béarn was originally laid down as a Normandie-class battleship but later finished as an aircraft carrier, displacing 22,100 tons and serving during the interbellum years and WWII. As a converted carrier, its speed was slow and it had limited space for aircraft, but the medium armor belt and long range made up for these shortcomings. Its construction gave important experience to the French designers in the DCAN (Direction des Constructions et Armes Navale) and led to a series of design studies afterward.
translation: 贝亚恩号最初被作为一艘诺曼底级战列舰而建造，但最终完工时被改造为航空母舰，排水量22100吨并自两次大战间服役至二战。作为改修型的航母，她的速度很慢而且机库很小，但其中等的装甲带和长作战半径弥补了这些缺点。贝亚恩号的制造使得法国DCAN（海军装备制造管理局）的设计人员积累了重要的经验，并促成了之后的一系列设计研究工作。

original: The Joffre-class carriers (Project name PA-16) were the next generation of carriers for the French Navy. It was the last of the design studies that started in 1929 and ended in 1937. Two ships were authorized in the 1938 naval program, but the escalating conflicts slowed down the construction process and eventually the Fall of France prevented the completion of these ships. Displacement would be around 20,000 tons. They would have good AA armament, armor, and speed, but a below-average aircraft complement. Overall, it would have been a well-rounded and versatile carrier for the French Navy.
translation: 霞飞级航母（项目代号PA16）是法国的第二代航母，是自1929年至1938年间设计研究工作的最终成果。全部的两艘霞飞级航母都在1938年的海军项目中获批，但日渐升级的冲突延缓了其建造进程，最终法国的沦陷使得这两艘船未能完工。其设计排水量为20000吨，拥有良好的防空武器、装甲和速度，但飞机的搭载量低于平均值。总体来讲，这是一款面面俱到的通用型航母。

original: The Jean Bart carrier was a mid-war proposal to convert the unfinished Richelieu class battleship Jean Bart into a full scale carrier in a similar way to the Japanese IJN Shinano. The hull's large size would be resulted in a large aircraft component and together with the big engines a long range and fast carrier. The heavy AA armament of US origin would provide a good defense against aircraft and smaller surface combatants.
translation: 让·巴尔级航母是战争中期时的一个提案，建议仿照日本帝国海军信浓号的改造方案，将未完工的黎塞留级战列舰让·巴尔号改造成一艘正规航母。其庞大的船体将能够容纳大量的飞机，再加上其马力强劲的引擎，将使其成为一款作战半径出色的快速航母，源自美国的重型防空火力能在对抗空中威胁和小型水面战斗舰艇是提供很好的防护。

original: The Clemenceau class aircraft carrier (Project name PA-28) were the first postwar carrier design of the French Navy. The design would be similar to the unfinished Joffre class carriers, though the installed equipment and weaponry would be of modern French products. The acquisition of the USN and RN escort carriers and the economical state of postwar France prevented these ships from being laid down. Not to be confused with the latter Clemenceau class aircraft carriers (Project name PA-54), which were laid down in 1955 and 1957.
translation: 克列孟梭级航母（项目代号PA-28）是法国海军的第一款战后航母设计，其设计方案类似未完成的霞飞级航母，安装的设备和武器系统则是法国的最新产品，但战后法国的经济状况及获得自美国与英国海军的护航航母使得这一项目未能落实。请不要与之后1955年及1957年开工的克列孟梭级航母（项目代号PA-54）混淆。

original: The UB III Type coastal submarine was a class of U-boat built during World War I by the German Imperial Navy. They carried ten torpedoes and displaced over 500 tons. Between 1916 and 1918, 96 were built, though all were out of service by 1935.
translation: UB III级近海潜艇是德意志帝国海军在一战期间建造的一级U艇。它们的排水量超过了500吨并且可以携带10枚鱼雷。该潜艇在1916至1918年间共建造了96艘，到1935年时全部退役。

original: The German Type IIA submarine was a single hull, all welded coastal submarine with internal ballast tanks. It displaced over 250 tons and mounts five 533mm torpedo tubes. Six were built between 1934 and 1935.
translation: 德国IIA级潜艇是一种带有内部压载舱的单艇壳、全焊接制造的近海潜艇。它的排水量超过了250吨并且装备了5门533毫米鱼雷发射管。该潜艇从1934至1935年共建造了6艘。

original: The Type VIIC seagoing submarine was the workhorse of the German U-boat force, with 568 commissioned between 1940 and 1945. The ships displaced 770 tons and were armed with five 533mm torpedo tubes.
translation: VIIC级远洋潜艇堪称是德国U艇部队的军马，1940至1945年间共有568艘该潜艇服役。它的排水量为770吨并携带有5门533毫米鱼雷发射管。

original: Type XXI submarines, also known as 'Elektroboote', were the first submarines designed to operate primarily submerged, rather than as surface ships that could submerge as a means to escape detection or launch an attack. Its key features were its streamlined hull and conning tower and its large number of battery cells. It was among the largest of the German submarine classes, displacing over 1,620 tons. There were 118 ships commissioned between 1943 and 1945.
translation: 绰号“电动潜艇”的XXI级潜艇是第一种将潜航作为主要行动方式、而非仅仅作为躲避追捕和袭击敌舰的手段的潜艇。它流线型的船体，艇上装配的司令塔以及大量的蓄电池是该艇的主要特点。它是德国所有潜艇中最大的一级，排水量超过1620吨。1943至1945年间共有118艘该潜艇服役。

original: The Type 23 was a class of torpedo boat built for the Kriegsmarine following World War I. Six vessels were built between 1926 and 1928 and all served during World War II. Despite their torpedo boat designation, the ships were destroyer-sized, displacing over 920 tons and armed with three 105mm L/45 guns.
translation: 23型驱逐舰纳粹德国海军在一战之后建造的一级鱼雷艇。该舰在1926年至1928年间共建造了6艘，并且全部参加了第二次世界大战。虽然设计是鱼雷艇的设计，但它们的大小却是驱逐舰的大小。该舰的排水量超过了920吨并且装配有3门105毫米45倍径舰炮。

original: The Zerstörer 1934 class was the first class of German destroyers built since World War I. They were armed with five 5" guns and eight torpedo tubes. 16 ships were built, out of which 12 were the improved Zerstörer 1934A subclass.
translation: 1934型驱逐舰是德国一战之后建造的第一种驱逐舰。它们装配有5门5英寸舰炮以及8门鱼雷发射管。该舰共建造了16艘，其中12艘后来被升级改装为1934A型驱逐舰。

original: Zerstörer 1936A, known to the allies as Narvik Class destroyers, was designed to carry the new 150mm (5.9") guns. Designed with three single guns aft and a twin gun in the bow, they were originally fitted with a single gun in the bow. Four of the eight ships of the class were later refitted with the twin turrets. A second group of seven destroyers were built to a slightly modified design with twin guns in the bow.
translation: 被盟军称为纳尔维克级驱逐舰的1936A型驱逐舰是为了携带5门150毫米（5.9英寸）新式舰炮而设计的。三门舰炮安装在舰艉的三座单装炮塔内，另外的两门安装在舰艏的一座双联装炮塔内。不过该舰最初舰艏只装配有1门舰炮。后来8艘该级舰中的4艘接受改装安装了双联装炮塔。第二批次的7艘驱逐舰对舰艏的双联装炮塔做了一些细小的改动。

original: Although the first prototype of a diesel powered destroyer (Zerstörer 1942) was not completed, the development of the ship type continued. Several proposals were made which finally lead to the Zerstörer 1944 project. In addition to a heavy main armament, the ships had an increased Flak armament compared to its predecessors, including the new 5,5 cm AA gun.
translation: 虽然第一种柴油机驱动的驱逐舰（1942型驱逐舰）的原型最终没有建成，但是对该级舰的发展工作仍在继续。其中几种思路最终催生出了1944型驱逐舰工程。除了强大的火力之外，该舰与它的前辈们相比还装配了更多的对空武器，其中包括新式5.5cm防空炮。

original: Emden was the first large warship built in Germany after World War I. She was laid down in 1921 and commissioned in 1925. The armament consisted of eight 150mm (5.9") guns in single turrets.
translation: 埃姆登号轻巡洋舰是德国在一战之后建造的第一艘大型军舰。她从1921年开始动工建造并与1925年进入现役。武器是8门单装150毫米（5.9英寸）舰炮。

original: The Leipzig-class light cruisers were built between 1928 and 1935 as improvements over the preceding Königsberg-class cruisers. They displaced over 8,100 tons, had adequate speed and range, and were armed with nine 15cm SK C/25 guns in their main armament.
translation: 生产于1928年至1935年间的莱比锡级轻巡洋舰是柯尼斯堡级巡洋舰的改进型。它的排水量超过了8100吨，并且有较快的航速以及足够远的航程，主要武器是9门150毫米SK C/25型舰炮。

original: The M-class cruisers were designed as scouts for commerce raiding squadrons. Six ships were ordered as part of Plan Z, with two being laid down before work was halted at the outbreak of the war. The main armament would have been eight 150mm guns in four twin turrets.
translation: M级巡洋舰是为了侦搜敌商用运输船队而设计的。作为Z计划的一部分，该级舰共计划建造6艘，其中两艘在大战开始前已经开始动工，大战开始后停止建造。其主要武器是8门装在双联装炮塔中的150毫米舰炮。

original: The Q-class cruisers were a modified M-class design. They were designed to be larger than the M-class with a heavier anti-aircraft armament and improved fire control.
translation: Q级巡洋舰是M级巡洋舰的改进型。该级巡洋舰放大了M级的舰身，并且配备有更强大的防空火力以及改进的火控系统。

original: Blücher was the last armored cruiser built by Germany. Her design was innovative for her time and paved the way for the later Von der Tann-class Battlecruisers. By World War I, she was already obsolete. Blücher was sunk at the Battle at the Doggerbank in 1915.
translation: 布吕歇尔号是德国建造的最后一艘装甲巡洋舰。她的设计在当时是革命性的，并为之后的冯·德·坦恩级战列巡洋舰的设计开拓了道路。不过到了第一次世界大战时，她已经略显过时了。布吕歇尔号最终于1915年在多格尔沙洲海战中战沉。

original: The Admiral Hipper Class heavy cruisers were the first heavy cruisers of the Kriegsmarine. Officially displacing 10,000 tons, in reality they displaced over 16000 tons. They were armed with eight 8" guns in four twin turrets, with a secondary battery of twelve 105mm guns.
translation: 西佩尔海军上将级重巡洋舰是德国纳粹海军的第一种重巡洋舰。尽管官方称它的排水量只有10000吨，但是实际上它的排水量超过了16000吨。该级舰的武器主要是8门装在双联装炮塔中的8英寸舰炮以及12门105毫米副炮。

original: Officially part of the Hipper Class, the Prinz Eugen subclass incorporates many improvements, including a heavier anti air armament. Of the three ships in the subclass, only Prinz Eugen was completed. She participated in the sinking of HMS Hood during Operation Rheinübung. After the war, she was transferred to the United States and served as USS Prinz Eugen in the Able and Baker atomic bomb tests before sinking at the Kwajalein Atoll in 1946.
translation: 正式地说，该级舰是希佩尔级的一部分，但它相较希佩尔级有很多改进之处，例如更强大的防空火力。该级舰计划建造三艘，但最终只有欧根亲王号完成了建造。她在莱茵河演习行动中参与了击沉英国皇家海军胡德号的战斗。战后，该舰被移交给美国并更名为USS欧根亲王号。此后她还参与了“Able”和”Baker“两次核爆试验，最终于1946年在瓜加林环礁沉没。

original: The P Class was a large heavy cruiser design, officially designated as Panzerschiff (Armored Ship) by the Kriegsmarine. Displacing almost 24,000 tons, they would have been 3,000 tons lighter but 55 meters longer than the U.S. New York-class battleships. The armament consisted of six 280mm guns in two triple turrets.
translation: P级的设计比一般的重巡洋舰更大一些，纳粹德国海军官方对其分级为装甲舰。它的排水量接近24000吨，重量比美国纽约级战列舰轻3000吨，但长度比它长55米。武器是6门装在三联装炮塔中的280毫米舰炮。

original: The three ships of the Yorck-class battlecruisers were designed in response to the British Renown Class. They would have been armed with eight 380mm guns in four twin turrets. All three ships were laid down in 1916, but none were completed due to the war.
translation: 三艘约克级战列巡洋舰是为了应对英国声望级战列巡洋舰而建造的。它们装备有8门装在双联装炮塔中的380毫米舰炮。三舰均于1916年开始动工，但由于战争的原因无一完成。

original: In 1939, the Kriegsmarine decided to replace three of the planned P-class cruisers with battlecruisers. This resulted in the O-class battlecruisers, armed with six 38cm (15") guns in three twin turrets. The ships were designed with a displacement of 35,400 tons and a top speed of 35 knots. Construction orders were given for the three ships of the class, but none were started.
translation: 1939年，纳粹德国海军决定将计划中的P级巡洋舰中的三艘替换为战列巡洋舰。这催生了O级战列巡洋舰，该舰装配有6门装在双联装炮塔中的38厘米（15英寸）舰炮，设计排水量35400吨，最高航速35节。造船厂接到了三艘该级舰的订单，但建造工作从未开始。

original: Following the Treaty of Versailles, Germany was allowed to retain six pre-dreadnought battleships. Classified as Linienschiffe (Ships of the Line) by the Kriegsmarine, only two ships of the Deutschland Class, not to be confused with the later Deutschland-class Pocket Battleships, remained in active service through the 1930s. At 04:47 on September 1, 1939, Schleswig-Holstein fired the first shots of World War II as she opened fire on the Westerplatte base in Danzig, Poland.
translation: 凡尔赛和约签订之后，德国可以保留六艘前无畏级战列舰。根据纳粹德国海军的分级，只有两艘德意志级战列舰（并非后来的德意志级袖珍战列舰）直到20世纪30年代还在服役。1939年9月1日4时47分，石勒苏益格-荷尔斯泰因号炮击位于波兰但泽的韦斯特普拉特基地，打响了第二次世界大战的第一枪。

original: The Scharnhorst-class battleships were the first modern battleships to be built for the Kriegsmarine. They were built as a response to the French Dunkerque-class battlecruisers, themselves a response to the German Deutschland-class Panzerschiffe (Pocket Battleships). The Scharnhorst class is armed with nine 283mm (11") guns in three triple turrets. Plans were made to up gun them with twin 380mm (15") guns, but with the outbreak of the war, this never happened.
translation: 沙恩霍斯特级战列舰是纳粹德国海军建造的第一级现代化战列舰。它们是为了应对法国敦刻尔克级战列巡洋舰而建造的，而后者本身又是为了应对德国德意志级袖珍战列舰而建造的。沙恩霍斯特级装配有9门装在三联装炮塔中的283毫米（11英寸）舰炮。曾经有将其武装改为双联装380毫米（15英寸）舰炮的计划，但由于战争的爆发从未执行。

original: The two-ship Bismarck-class battleships were the largest warships built for the Kriegsmarine. The ships were designed in response to the new French battleships under construction, with a similar armament of eight 38cm (15") guns as the Richelieu Class, with four twin turrets as opposed to the two quad turrets of the Richelieus. Bismarck is famous for the sinking of the British battlecruiser HMS Hood in the Battle of the Denmark Strait, but was subsequently hunted down and sunk before reaching port.
translation: 两艘俾斯麦级战列舰是纳粹德国海军建造过的最大的军舰。两舰是为了应对法国建造中的新式战列舰而设计的，也因此它们采用了与黎塞留级相似的武装——8门38厘米（15英寸）舰炮，只不过前者将舰炮装在了4座双联装炮塔中而后者则装在了2座四联装炮塔中。俾斯麦号因在丹麦海峡海战中击沉了英国战列巡洋舰胡德号而一战成名，不过在那之后还未能回到港口便被英国海军围歼。

original: The German Plan Z envisioned a force of ten battleships in order to challenge the naval power of the United Kingdom. The H-class was a series of designs for the six battleships needed to meet the demands of the plan. Two ships of the H39 design were laid down at the outbreak of World War II, but construction was halted as the war begun. Neither of the ships were officially named, but Hindenburg was speculated as a possible name for the lead ship of the class. Had the ships been completed, they would have been augmented Bismarck Class ships, with a main battery of eight 40.6cm (16") guns.
translation: 德国的Z计划中计划建造10艘战列舰来挑战英国的海军，兴登堡级是为了其中的六艘提出的一系列设计。H39设计的两艘于二战爆发前夕开工建造，但因为战争的爆发而被叫停。两舰均未获得过正式命名，但据推测兴登堡号是该级舰首舰的一个可能的名称。该级舰如若完成，它们会更像是装备了8门40.6厘米（16英寸）舰炮的放大版俾斯麦级。

original: Designed in 1915, the Flugzeugdampfer I (Airplane Steamer I) Project was a conversion of the incomplete passenger liner Ausonia into an aircraft carrier. The construction was abandoned at the end of World War I. Had she been completed, she would have carried a mix of seaplanes and wheeled aircraft in her three hangars and would have displaced 12,500 tons.
translation: 于1915年设计的一号航空母舰（一号飞机轮船）工程计划将未完工的奥索尼亚号客轮改建为一艘航空母舰。建造工作于一战之后被废止。该舰如若完成，她的排水量将达12500吨并将在三个机库中同时装载水上飞机以及使用机轮起降的舰载机。

original: Seydlitz was laid down as the fourth ship of the Admiral Hipper-class heavy cruisers. Partially completed by the beginning of the war, she was considered for conversion into an aircraft carrier. The project, codenamed Weser 1, was partially underway when work was halted due to increasing air attacks on Bremen and the lack of resources for her construction.
translation: 赛德利茨号是作为希佩尔海军上将级重巡洋舰的四号舰开工建造的。开战时已经部分完成，开战之后人们计划将其改装为航空母舰。该工程代号为威悉河一号，直至出于空袭愈发频繁和缺少原材料的原因而被叫停之前已经部分完工。

original: Graf Zeppelin was the only class of ships in the Kriegsmarine that had been designed as an aircraft carrier from the keel up. Two ships were ordered, but neither was completed. As designed, the Graf Zeppelin would carry 30 Bf-109T fighters and 12 Ju-87E dive bombers, ship versions of the Bf-109E and the Ju-87D.
translation: 齐柏林伯爵级是纳粹德国海军唯一一级专门设计的航空母舰。海军下达了两艘该级舰的订单，但两舰均未完成。设计中齐柏林伯爵级将搭载30架Bf-109T战斗机和12架Ju-87E俯冲轰炸机，两种飞机分别是Bf-109E和Ju-87D的舰载版。

original: Several civilian ships were considered for conversions to aircraft carriers by the Kriegsmarine in the 1940s. The largest of these ships was the passenger ship Europa. Being the largest passenger ship in Germany, she had been used as a barracks ship and a troop transport before work began on converting her to a carrier. Had she been completed, she would have displaced 56,000 tons and carried an air group of 42 aircraft.
translation: 1940年之后纳粹德国海军曾考虑将数艘民用船只改装为航空母舰，其中最大的一艘便是客轮欧罗巴号。作为德国最大的客轮，她在改装工作开始前就已经被征用为一艘运兵船了。该舰如若完成，她的排水量将达56000吨并搭载42舰载机。

original: The H41 design of battleships was an improvement over the previous H39 design. The design called for significantly stronger armor, strengthened torpedo bulkheads and protection for the ships rudder and propeller shafts. The main battery was upgraded to eight 42cm guns, larger than that of the proposed Lion Class battleships of the United Kingdom. As designed, these ships would have a displacement of almost 70,000 tons.
translation: H41设计是之前的H39设计的改进版。该设计拥有显著增强的装甲，加强的防雷鼓包以及对转向舵和推进轴更完善的保护。主炮亦被升级为8门42厘米舰炮，口径比英国计划建造的狮级战列舰更大。根据设计，该级舰的排水量将接近70000吨。

original: The H44 Class was the last of the H-series of Battleship designs. With no limit on gun caliber or displacement, the H42 to H44 designs mounted increasingly heavier armament and armor protection, culminating in the 131,000 ton H44 design armed with eight 508mm (20") guns.
translation: H44级是H系列设计的最终之作。没有了舰炮口径及排水量的限制，H42至H44设计拥有大幅增强的武装和装甲，排水量达到131000吨的H44设计装配有8门508毫米（20英寸）舰炮。

original: The Geoffredo Mameli class is a class of medium submarines of the Regia Marina launched between 1926 and 1928. They displaced just under 800 tons and had a diving depth of 100m. They were the basis for subsequent models such as the Pisani, Bandiera, and Squalo classes.
translation: 戈弗雷·马梅利级是意大利皇家海军的一种中型潜艇，于1926年至1928年间下水，排水量近800吨，下潜深度达到100米。以马梅利级作为基础，意大利其后又建造了一系列潜艇，例如皮萨尼级，旗帜级和鲨鱼级。

original: The Perla-class and Adua-class submarines were built in the 1930s. They were the third and fourth sub-classes of the 600 Series of submarines built by Italy. They were smaller than their predecessors, displacing just over 600 tons.
translation: 珍珠级和阿杜瓦级潜艇在20世纪30年代制造，是意大利建造的600系列潜艇的第三和第四款型号。相较于前任，她们体型较小，排水量刚刚超过600吨。

original: The Marconi class was a class of six submarines built between 1939 and 1940 and succeeded the earlier Luizzi submarines. The submarines of both classes displaced about 1,000 tons and had eight 533mm torpedo tubes. Only one ship of the two classes combined survived the war.
translation: 马可尼级由六艘潜艇组成，于1939年至1940年间建造，是利乌齐级的继任者。这两个型号的潜艇排水量为1000吨，有八枚533mm鱼雷发射管。两个型号合计仅有一艘得以在战争中幸存。

original: The Pietro Calvi subclass involved only minor improvements over the preceding Flutto class, which was a class of medium-sized submarines. Only a handful were launched, as most hulls were captured by the Germans after the Italian armistice. A redesigned version of the Pietro Calvi was finally commissioned in 1961.
translation: 彼埃特罗·卡尔维级潜艇仅仅在其前身中型潜艇巨浪级的基础上做了非常微小的改进。只有一小部分该型号潜艇成功下水，而大多数船体都在意大利与盟军休战后被德国缴获。一款重新设计的彼埃特罗·卡尔维级潜艇最终在1961年服役。

original: Curtatone-class destroyers were the first destroyers to be built in Italy after the end of World War I and were the first destroyers to use twin gun mountings. The ships were originally ordered at the same time as the Palestro class destroyers, but were postponed due to steel shortages. They displaced just under 1,000 tons and mount four 102mm Schneider-Armstrong guns.
translation: 库尔塔内托级驱逐舰是一战后在意大利建造的第一批驱逐舰，也是第一艘使用双联装炮塔的驱逐舰。这一型号原本与帕莱斯特罗级于同一时间订购，但因钢材紧缺而被延期。其排水量仅为不到1000吨，安装有四门102mm施耐德-阿姆斯特朗炮。

original: The Soldati class were a group of destroyers built in the late 1930s. There were two batches. Twelve ships made up the first batch in 1938-39. Five ships were completed in the second batch in 1941-42. The first batch displaced just over 1,800 tons and was armed with four 120mm Ansaldo guns.
translation: 索尔达蒂级是指20世纪30年代末建造的一系列驱逐舰，共分为两批。第一批十二艘于1938-39年建造，第二批五艘在1941-42年建造。第一批的排水量为1800吨，装备有四门120mm安萨尔多火炮。

original: The Ciclone-class destroyers were designated as torpedo boats but were really more of a destroyer escort. They were slightly enlarged versions of the previous Orsa class, displacing over 1,100 tons, and had improved stability and heavier anti-submarine armament.
translation: 旋风级驱逐舰最初被设计为鱼雷艇，但实际上更接近护航驱逐舰。作为熊级的增大版，其排水量达到1100吨，更为稳定并拥有更为强大的反潜武器。

original: The Comandanti Medaglie d'Oro class were a group of destroyers planned for the Regia Marina but never launched by the time of the Italian Armistice. The ships were significantly larger than previous Italian destroyers, displacing nearly 2,100 tons. They were also armed with the larger, 135mm Ansaldo guns and had improved engines.
translation: 金牌级是一组计划列装意大利皇家海军的驱逐舰，但直到休战前都未能下水。比起之前的意大利驱逐舰，这一型号的体型明显有所增大，排水量接近2100吨，装备有更大的135mm安萨尔多舰炮并配备有改良版的引擎。

original: The cruisers Taranto and Bari were World War I-era cruisers obtained from Germany as reparations. Both displaced between 4,500 and 5,100 tons and were armed with German 150mm SK/45 guns.
translation: 塔兰托级和巴里级巡洋舰是作为赔款从德国得到的一战巡洋舰。其排水量都介于4500吨至5100吨，装备有德制150mm45倍径舰炮。

original: The Duca degli Abruzzi class was the fifth subclass of the Condottieri-class light cruisers. They were built before World War II to gain predominance in the Mediterranean Sea. They were the largest Italian light cruisers commissioned during the war, displacing over 9,400 tons. They were well-armored and mount ten 152mm Ansaldo guns.
translation: 阿布鲁奇公爵级是驱逐领舰级轻巡洋舰的第五个型号，在二战前建造以争夺地中海霸权。这是意大利在战争期间列装的最大的轻巡洋舰，排水量9400吨，有着良好的装甲防护，并装备有十门152mm安萨尔多火炮。

original: Capitani Romani light cruisers were essentially designed to outrun and outgun the large new French destroyers of the late 1930s. Twelve hulls were ordered in late 1939, but only three were completed before the Italian armistice in 1943. They were lightly armored and displaced only 3,700 tons, but were quite fast. They mount eight 135mm OTO/Ansaldo guns.
translation: 罗马统帅级轻巡洋舰最初被设计以期在速度和火力方面压过法国30年代末的驱逐舰，于1939年底订购了十二个船体，但在1943年意大利宣布停战前仅有三艘完工。这一型号装甲轻薄，排水量仅为3700吨，但速度很快，装备有八门135mm口径OTO/安萨尔多火炮。

original: The San Marco class is an improved version of the earlier Capitani Romani light cruisers. Due to the Italian armistice the San Marco, and her redesigned sister ship the San Giorgio, were not commissioned until the 1950s.
translation: 圣马可级是罗马统帅级轻巡洋舰的改进版本。由于意大利签署的停战协定的影响，圣马可号与其重新设计的姊妹舰圣乔治号直到20世纪50年代才得以服役。

original: The Trento class was a heavy cruiser design of the Regia Marina from the late 1920s. They were the first ships designed specifically to the limitations of the Washington Naval Treaty, which limited cruisers to 10,000 tons and 8 in. guns. The last ship of the class, the Bolzano, was an improved design launched in 1932.
translation: 特伦托级是一种自20世纪20年代末开始为意大利皇家海军设计的重巡洋舰，是第一批基于华盛顿海军协定设计的舰船，因此其排水量被限定为10000吨，火炮则被限定在8英寸。这一型号的最后一艘巴尔扎诺号于1932年下水。

original: The San Giorgio class is a hypothetical class of interwar heavy cruisers that would have been launched shortly before the start of the war. These cruisers would displace over 11,000 tons and mount eight 203mm Ansaldo guns.
translation: 圣乔治级是一款两战间的重巡洋舰构想，原计划于战争前夕下水，其排水量为11000吨，装备八门203mm安萨尔多炮。

original: The Pisa class is a hypothetical heavy cruiser from the mid-war era. It displaced around 12,000 tons and acted as the lead of its own patrol force.
translation: 比萨级是一款二战中期的重巡洋舰构想，排水量12000吨，计划扮演巡逻舰队旗舰的角色。

original: The Garibaldi class is a hypothetical class of late-war heavy cruisers. It displaced about 14,000 tons, was well-armed with eight 203mm OTO/Ansaldo guns, and could keep up with most carriers and other capital ships.
translation: 加里波第级时一款二战后期的重巡洋舰构想，排水量14000吨，装甲精良，配有八门203mm口径OTO/安萨尔多炮，能够与大多数航母及主力舰保持协同。

original: The Francesco Caracciolo class was a class of capital ships was proposed just after WWI. The ships displaced about 34,000 tons, were well-armored, and fairly fast for their size and vintage. Only one ship was launched, but it was cancelled in 1921.
translation: 弗朗西斯科·卡拉乔洛级是在一战刚结束时提出的一项主力舰计划，排水量34000吨，装甲精良，就其体型和充满时代风格的款式而言速度相当快。这一型号仅有一艘舰船得以下水，但最终于1921年取消。

original: The Principe Amedeo class is a hypothetical battlecruiser that would have launched around the late 1930s. It would be comparable to the French Dunkerque battlecruisers, displacing about 30,000 tons and armed with 320mm guns in their main battery.
translation: 阿梅迪奥王子级是一款计划于20世纪30年代末下水的战列巡洋舰构想，其性能将比肩法国的敦刻尔克级战列巡洋舰，排水量30000吨，主炮塔装备320mm舰炮。

original: The Conte Di Cavour class battleships were commissioned during World War I. They had 305mm Armstrong-Vickers guns, displaced 23,000 tons, and had a top speed comparable to other dreadnought-era battleships. Starting in 1933, the two remaining ships of the class underwent a serious redesign, improving their size, armament, and performance to be on par with the emerging 'fast' battleships of the time.
translation: 加富尔伯爵级战列舰于一战期间服役，装备305mm阿姆斯特朗-维克斯炮，排水量23000吨，与其他无畏舰相比拥有顶级的航速。自1933年起，仅存的两艘这一型号舰船进行了一系列的改造，升级了体型和武器，其性能也得以比肩同时代新兴的高速战列舰。

original: The Caio Duilio class of battleships were originally commissioned at the start of World War I. Both ships, however, underwent a complete redesign between 1937 and 1940. This model represents the redesign. The armament is upgraded to ten 320mm M1934 guns, the displacement is now 29,000 tons, and the speed is enough to classify them as a 'fast' battleship.
translation: 卡约·杜伊利奥级战列舰原本自一战伊始时服役，但全部的两艘都在1937年和1940年进行了彻底的改造。其武器升级为十门320mm1934型火炮，排水量达到29000吨，航速也足以匹配高速战列舰。

original: The Littorio class, also known as the Vittorio Veneto class, represented the most modern battleships used by Italy during World War II. They displaced over 40,000 tons and were very fast for their size. They formed the backbone of the Italian fleet.
translation: 利托里奥级也被称作维托里奥·维内托级，是意大利在二战期间服役的最先进的战列舰。其排水量超过40000吨，就其体型而言航速非常快。利托里奥级构成了意大利海军舰队的绝对主力。

original: The Impero battleships were a hypothetical class of late-war battleships. They displaced about 43,000 tons, were armed with 381mm Ansaldo guns, and were well-armored.
translation: 帝国级战列舰是一款二战后期的战列舰构想，其排水量为43000吨，装备381mm安萨尔多炮，装甲精良。

original: The Giuseppe Miraglia class is a hypothetical class of early interwar aircraft carriers. It is comparable to the U.S. Lexington class carriers and the Japanese Kaga or Akagi carriers.
translation: 朱塞佩·米拉利亚级是一款早期的两战间航空母舰设计构想，其性能比肩美国的列克星敦级和日本的赤城号、加贺号航母。

original: The Falco is a hypothetical class of interwar Italian aircraft carriers They were comparable to the U.S. Yorktown class carriers and the British Ark Royal carrier. They displaced about 21,000 tons, had decent armor, and carried an average complement of aircraft.
translation: 鹰级是一款两战间的意大利航母构想，其性能比肩美国的约克城级和英国的皇家方舟号航母。排水量21000吨，装甲精良，飞机搭载量达到当时的平均水平。

original: The Aquila was a planned conversion of an ocean liner, the Roma. The conversion was to begin in 1941, but the project was never completed. If completed, the Aquila would displace 23,500 tons and would be comparable to the Japanese Hiyo class and the British Indomitable class carriers.
translation: 鹫座号是一艘计划由罗马号远洋班轮改造而来的航母。这项改造自1941年开始，但最终未能完工。按照计划，鹫座号的排水量将是23500吨，性能比肩日本的飞鹰级和英国的无敌级航母。

original: The Sparviero was also a planned conversion of an ocean liner, the Augustus. The conversion began in late 1942, but did not get far. Germany scuttled the ship upon its capture after the Italian armistice. The carrier would have displaced 30,400 tons, been fairly well-armored, and had a strong AA defense battery.
translation: 雀鹰号是一艘计划由奥古斯都号远洋班轮改造而来的航母。这项改造自1942年底开始，但未能持续多久。意大利与盟军休战后，德国俘获并破坏了这艘船。雀鹰号计划排水量为30400吨，装甲极为精良，配备有强大的防空炮组。

original: The Regina Margherita class is a hypothetical class of heavy battleships that would have been launched shortly before the start of the war. They would be comparable to the Japanese Yamato class battleships. They would be very well-armored, displace about 60,000 tons, and be armed with 406mm guns.
translation: 玛格丽塔女王级是一款原计划于二战前夕下水的重型战列舰构想。其设计性能比肩日本的大和号战列舰，装甲极为精良，排水量60000吨，装备406mm火炮。

original: The Regina Elena class is a hypothetical class of heavy battleships that would be launched around the time of Italy's entry into the war. They were comparable to the Montana class battleships planned by the U.S. They were highly armored, displaced over 70,000 tons, and were armed with 406mm guns in their main battery.
translation: 埃琳娜女王级是一款原计划于意大利参战时下水的重型战列舰构想。其设计性能比肩美国的蒙大拿级战列舰计划，装甲度极高，排水量70000吨，装备406mm主炮。

original: The kaichu class submarines were built after WWI and based on the earlier submarines. These medium-sized submarines were adequately armed, possesses good operational range and had good speed for their time, but by 1938 they were somewhat outdated. Altogether 42 Kaichu type submarines were built for the IJN and the series included 7 variants.
translation: 海中型（吕35级）是一战之后根据之前的潜艇改进的潜艇。这种中型潜艇在建成的时候拥有当时而言不错的武器、较高的航程和速度，然而到了1938年时就显得过时了。IJN一共建造了7种型号共42条此型潜艇。

original: The Kaidai VI class submarines were large and well-armed submarines with long range and relatively good speed. The entire Kaidai series of submarines were stable and successful boats which served the IJN until the Pacific War ended.
translation: 海大IV型（伊162级）潜艇是大型潜艇，拥有较好的武装、较快的速度和很高的航程。海大系列潜艇性能稳定，在IJN一直服役到战争结束。

original: The Ko-gata, Otsu-gata, and Hei-gata class boats were large-sized cruiser submarines which served as command ships for submarine squadrons. They were equipped with sophisticated radio equipment, heavy torpedo armament and their larger sizes meant a large operational radius. The Ko and Otsu-gata classes carried float-planes as well for scouting role.
translation: 巡潜甲型（伊9级）、乙型（伊15级）、丙型（伊16级）潜艇属于大型巡洋潜艇。它们装备着尖端通信设施和强大的鱼雷，被作为潜艇战队司令舰使用。较大的船体意味着它们有着很高的航程。甲型和乙型还装备着水上侦查机。

original: The Sen-Toku class submarines were the largest submersibles of WWII. They were submarine aircraft carriers with heavy torpedo armament, adequate light AA and, due to their size and engines, relatively fast and long-ranged. They were able to carry three Aichi M6A Seiran aircraft for scouting and limited striking abilities.
translation: 潜特型（伊400级）潜艇是二战期间最大的潜水艇。它们属于潜水空母并装备着强大的鱼雷和不错的轻型防空炮。因为拥有巨大的船体和数量众多的引擎，它们拥有较快的速度和极高的航程。舰上装备着3架M6A晴岚水上攻击机，可以进行侦查并拥有一定的轰炸能力。

original: The Minekaze, Kamikaze, and Mutsuki class destroyers were well-armed both with surface guns and torpedoes for their time but had limited AA weaponry. They were considered obsolete at the start of WWII and relegated to mostly secondary roles.
translation: 峰风级、神风级和睦月级在建成时都拥有着同时代较好的舰炮和鱼雷，不过防空能力较差。在二战开始的时候她们已经过时，主要用于运输护卫等二线任务。

original: The Asashio class destroyers was the first Japanese destroyer class to exceed 2,000 tons displacement and the first to be equipped with sonar. They had heavy torpedo weaponry and adequate light AA guns, and a slightly larger operational radius than the older Fubuki class.
translation: 朝潮级是日本第一艘排水量超过2000吨的驱逐舰，也是第一个装备声呐的驱逐舰。她们拥有强大的鱼雷和充足的轻型防空炮，以及比旧型吹雪级稍高的航程。

original: The Akizuki class destroyers were well-armed with both surface guns and torpedoes, adequate AA armament, as well as much needed extra depth charges. Out of the 39 planned only 12 were completed before the series was cancelled.
translation: 秋月级装备着强大舰炮和鱼雷、不俗的防空以及当时战局急需的深水炸弹。一共计划建造39艘，不过在计划取消前只建成12艘。

original: The Shimakaze class was the fastest destroyer in the world at the time of its completion. It was a prototype destroyer to test out new high-temperature, high-pressure turbines. It was extremely fast and heavily armed with torpedoes, but this meant a smaller radius of operations.
translation: 岛风级在建成时是世界上最快的驱逐舰。她是新型高温高压锅炉的实验舰，速度极高并装备着非常强大的鱼雷；不过相对的，航程略有降低。

original: Tenryu class ships displaced around 4,400 tons and were lightly armed compared to the similar vessels of other navies, but good speed and adequate torpedo armament made up for these shortcomings. They were designed to act as flagships for destroyer flotillas, and thus considered an intermediate class between the light cruiser and the destroyer.
translation: 天龙级排水量为4400吨。相比其他国家的同型舰，天龙级的装甲略显单薄，不过高航速和强力的鱼雷足矣弥补这个缺点。她们是作为水雷战队旗舰而设计的，定位上是一种介于轻巡洋舰和驱逐舰之间的舰种。

original: Mogami class cruisers were heavily armed, equipped with good armor and strong engines that provided high speed. They were up-gunned from their original design and reclassified as heavy cruisers. The good AA defense and high speed ensured a long range of operations.
translation: 最上级巡洋舰装备着强大的兵装、坚实的装甲以及高出力的引擎。凭借优秀的防空能力和很高的航速，她可以长时间在远洋工作。主炮升级之后被归为重巡洋舰。

original: The Agano-class light cruisers were designed primarily as flottila leaders for destroyer squadrons. They were fast, armed with 3 twin 152mm guns, but limited AA armaments and thin armor plates were major drawbacks of the design.
translation: 阿贺野级轻型巡洋舰是为了作为水雷战队旗舰而设计的。她们速度很快，并装备着三门152mm二连装主炮，不过防空和装甲不足是她们设计上的主要缺点。

original: The Agatsuma class was light cruiser class that never saw any ships built before the end of the war. The cruisers were designed to be fast and heavily armed but light-armored, to protect the fleets and carriers against enemy aircraft.
translation: 吾妻级轻巡洋舰直到战争结束都没有开始生产。她们被设计为高速、重装甲但轻兵装的巡洋舰，用于在敌军轰炸机面前保护航母和其它舰船。

original: The Furutaka-class and the following Aoba class heavy cruisers were the first heavy cruisers in the Imperial Japanese Navy. They were designed the US Omaha and British Hawkins class as templates. Later in their life they were modernized and received new armaments and better engines.
translation: 古鹰级以及之后的青叶级是日本海军最早的重巡洋舰。她们是以美国的奥马哈级和英国的霍金斯级为原型建造的。她们后来进行了近代化改装，升级了主炮和引擎。

original: The heavy Mogami class was an up-gunned and reclassified light cruiser class. This made them fast, heavily armed and well-armored cruisers. Their long range came at the cost of, thinner armor protection.
translation: 最上级原本是轻巡洋舰，升级了主炮之后成为重巡洋舰。她们是火力强大、装甲优秀的高速巡洋舰。不过作为长航程的代价，她们牺牲了一定的装甲。

original: The Tone class heavy cruisers were originally designed as light cruisers, but revisioned with heavier armaments. They were unique in that all armaments were positioned forward, while the aft part of the ship was used to carry and service float-planes that scouted for enemy forces.
translation: 利根级最初是作为轻巡设计的，不过后来改为重巡洋舰。她们的设计很独特：全部的主炮都在舰首，后甲板则用于存放和起降水上侦查机。

original: The Ibuki-class heavy cruisers were the last cruisers to be built by Japan before the end of the war. They were improved versions of the Mogami class heavy cruisers, featuring the same layout and armament but with more modern AA weaponry and engines.
translation: 伊吹级是日本在战争结束之前建造的最后的重巡洋舰。她们是最上级的升级版，使用同样的船体布局但是装备了更新型的防空炮和引擎。

original: The Amagi battlecruisers were a series of planned battlecruisers as part of the Japanese Navy's ambitious plan to have eight battleships and eight battlecruisers. Following the Washington Naval Treaty, the Amagi ships were scrapped, and one converted to a carrier.
translation: 天城级是日本海军八八舰队规划中的战列巡洋舰。后来因为华盛顿海军条约，除去一条改装为航母外，其余全部被废弃。

original: Design B-65 battlecruisers were fast, moderately armored vessels with good AA weaponry and modern armaments. Designed to fight the new heavy cruisers of the US Navy and to protect the fleet carriers of the IJN, the ships would have been a force to be reckoned with if finished.
translation: B65级是一种拥有强大火力、优秀防空能力、装甲中等的高速战列巡洋舰。她们是针对美国海军的新型重巡和航母而设计的，如果能造出来的话应当会为日本海军提供相当强的战力。

original: The Fuso class battleships were built during WWI and modernized in the 1930's when the 1st London Naval Treaty banned construction of new battleships for the signatories. They were well-armored and armed, with the 6 twin turrets on the centerline giving a heavy broadside, but also limiting the extra AA weaponry these ships could carry.
translation: 扶桑级建于一战。第一次伦敦伦敦海军条约禁止签约国建造新的战列舰之后，扶桑级在30年代进行了近代化改装。她们拥有优秀的装甲和火力——中心线上的六门二连装主炮可以对两舷进行威力强大的炮击——不过这也同时限制了她们所能携带的防空炮的数量。

original: The Kongo battleships were built for the IJN just before World War I as battlecruisers, but were heavily modernized in the late 1930s and reclassified as first rate fast battleships. Their armor, guns and engines were all drastically upgraded and the Kongos emerged as the fastest Japanese battleships of the war.
translation: 金刚级是一战前建造的，一开始为战列巡洋舰。不过她们在20世纪30年代后期经历了大规模的近代化改装，主炮、装甲和引擎都获得了全面提升。改造后的金刚级被归为一等高速战列舰，是日本战时最快的战列舰。

original: The Tajima class was a hypothetical class of fast battleships, designed to be cheaper and faster to build than the massive Yamato class battleships. They utilized the older cannons of previous battleships, but high speed, adequate armor and AA provided the defense for these ships.
translation: 但马级是假想中的可以比大和级更加便宜和快速建造的高速战列舰。她们使用之前战列舰的旧主炮，通过更快的速度、更好的装甲和防空能力来保护自己。

original: The Iwami class was a hypothetical class of battleships, that utilized new methods to speed up construction. They were well-armed with new cannons and heavy AA guns, and could match any similarly armed vessels for firepower. However, the resulting improvements meant a heavier and thus somewhat slower class of ships.
translation: 石见级是假想中的可以通过新式方法加速建造的战列舰。她们装备新型的主炮和重型防空炮，火力可以匹敌任何类似装备的舰船。不过这些改进导致石见级成为相对更大并且更慢的战列舰。

original: The Yamato class consisted of the heaviest battleships ever created, displacing 72,000 tons, and the ships were designed to be the pride and might of the Japanese navy under the Peace Goddesses plan. Each ship carried nine 460-millimetre naval guns, the largest naval artillery ever fitted to a warship.
translation: 大和级是人类历史上造出过的最大的战列舰，排水量72000吨。根据和平女神计划建造（译者注：大和级的建造计划实际是“第三次海军军备补充计划”，其中提到日本计划在1946拥有11艘51cm主炮改装的大和级战舰，“这些太平洋上的和平女神们”将足矣震慑美国海军让它不敢与日本开战，疑似是P社错误地将其当作计划名了），是日本海军的骄傲、力量的象征。每条船上都装备有九门46cm主炮——这是海军历史上军舰装备过的最大口径的火炮。

original: The hypothetical Super Yamato class saw the Yamato was used as a base, but the weapons would be even stronger with a main armament of 51cm cannons and a strong AA armament of the newest type. Their armor thickness was designed to withstand even shells from its own cannons, and they would displace around 70-80.000tons.
translation: 超大和级是在大和级的基础之上装上更强大的51cm主炮和最新型防空炮的计划。她们的装甲厚度夸张到可以承受自身的51cm口径炮弹；设计的排水量为70000~80000吨。

original: The aircraft carrier Kaga was Japan's first fleet carrier. She was originally a battleship, but finished as an aircraft carrier. This resulted in a large and heavily armored carrier with limited space for improvement. However, it was an important experience in aircraft carrier construction for the Imperial Japanese Navy.
translation: 加贺号航空母舰是日本第一条大型航空母舰。她本来是作为战列舰设计的，不过后来改装成航母，这导致她虽然有着巨大的船体和厚实的装甲但却缺乏改造的空间。不管怎样，她的建造为日本海军在空母设计上提供了宝贵的经验。

original: Soryu and Hiryu were designed with mirrored island superstructure to speed up aircraft recovery processes while sailing next to each other. They were fast carriers with room for large air groups, but minimally armored. They displaced 20.000tons and large engines provided high speed and a long range of operations.
translation: 苍龙号和飞龙号的舰岛是对称设计的，这样可以加快她们在并排航行时的飞机回收速度。她们拥有存放大量航空队的空间，不过相对的只有最低限度的装甲；排水量为20000吨，大型引擎可以提供较高的航速和较长的航程。

original: The Shokaku class aircraft carriers were designed for high speed, long radius of action, heavy protection and a large aircraft capacity, which made them excellent carriers. Due to the improved construction methods, they displaced 33.000tons full load, and could survive more damage than most contemporary carriers.
translation: 翔鹤级是性能优越的航空母舰，她们速度快、作战半径广、装甲厚并且可以装备大量的舰载机。因为生产技术的提高，她们排水量为33000吨，与同年代的其他航母相比可以承受更多的伤害。

original: The Taiho class aircraft carrier was the IJN's first fully armored carriers, with an armored flight deck to withstand multiple bomb and torpedo hits and still function effectively. A large air group together AND heavy AA armament would provide not just self-defense but also force projection over enemy forces.
translation: 大凤级是IJN第一种拥有全装甲保护的航空母舰，其装甲飞行甲板可以在承受多次轰炸后依然正常工作，而且船体也可以承受多发鱼雷。巨大的舰载机装载量和强大的防空火力不仅仅可以用来自卫，还使其拥有对敌舰队投射力量的能力。

original: Amerikansky Golland (American Holland) class submarines were built in Canada, then delivered to Russia during WWI, where they were finally assembled. They were the direct copy of the successful Holland type submarines. They were designed to be good sea boats well-armed for their time.
translation: 美国荷兰级(American Holland)潜水艇建造于加拿大，之后在一战期间交付给了俄国，并在俄国完成最后的组装。AG级潜艇直接复制了成功的荷兰型潜艇。在服役期内这类潜水艇被设计成装备良好的海船

original: The Series V submarines of the Schuka class were the second-most numerous submarines of the Soviet Navy. Their large number came from their deployment to the four fleets of the Soviet Union: Black Sea, Baltic, Northern and Pacific. They were medium-sized patrol submarines with good torpedo armament and seaworthiness.
translation: 狗鱼级V型潜水艇是苏联海军数量第二多的潜艇。他们庞大的数量源于苏联部署的四支舰队：黑海、波罗的海、北海和太平洋舰队。他们是中型体积的巡逻潜艇，配备了良好的鱼类武器并具备优良的适航性。

original: The Series XIV submarines were large cruising submarines with extended range. They were essentially an improved version of the Series IV Pravda class. These submarines featured heavy armament of both surface guns and torpedoes. They had a long range but only satisfactory seaworthiness.
translation: 14系列潜水艇是具备增程性能的大型巡航潜艇。本质上讲，他们是4系真理级潜艇的加强型号。这些潜艇配备了重型武器，包括对地机关炮和鱼雷。他们的武器射程长，但仅限于在其适应的海域。

original: The Project 611 submarines (NATO Codename: Zulu), were the Soviet Navy's first submarine class to be built after WWII. Their design was based on the German Type XXI submarines, and they were meant to replace the older Series XIV K class boats. They were large, ocean-going submarines with a heavy torpedo armament and long range. They were used as a basis for the follow-up Project 613 (NATO Codename: Whiskey) and Project 641 (NATO Codename: Foxtrot) class submarines.
translation: 611工程级潜水艇（NATO代号名称：祖鲁）是苏联海军第一支在二战后建造的潜艇。他们的设计基于德国21型潜艇，并用来替代旧的14系K级潜艇。这是一种大型、具备远洋性能并配备重型鱼类和远程打击能力的潜艇。在613工程级（NATO代号名称：威士忌）和641工程级（NATO代号名称：狐步舞）潜艇投入使用前，611工程级潜艇被用作基础潜艇。

original: The Orfey class destroyers were an improved version of the previous Novik class. They featured adequate surface and AA armament for their size, somewhat short range, but good speed and heavy torpedo armament. The succeeding Fidonisy and Izyaslav classes were further improved versions of this class with increased main armament and hull size.
translation: 奥菲斯级驱逐舰是早先诺维克级驱逐舰的加强型号。奥菲斯级配备了适用于其体型充足的对地和对空装备，射程稍短但射速快并且配备重型鱼雷武装。后续配备了更多武器并增加船体大小的Fidonisy和伊贾斯拉夫级驱逐舰是奥菲斯级的进一步改良型号。

original: The Gnevny class (Project 7) destroyers were authorized under the 1933-1938 shipbuilding program. The class itself was heavily influenced by the Italian destroyer Maestrale and considered a successful design. Their displacement were in the range of 1,600-2,000 tons, they were well-armed and they had adequate AA and torpedo armament. Due to the powerful engines they were fast but short-ranged vessels.
translation: 愤怒级（7工程）驱逐舰授权建造于1933-1938年的造船工程。这一级别的驱逐舰很大程度收到了意大利Maestrale驱逐舰的影响并被认为是一个成功的设计。它们的排水量是在1,600-2,000吨之间，装备精良，有足够的对空和鱼雷武器。由于强劲的发动机，他们速度快，但却是射程较短的船体。

original: The Soobrazitelnyi (Project 7U) destroyers were an improved version of the previous Gnevny class. Their engines were redesigned and they had a stronger AA armament. They displaced between 1,900 and 2,400 tons, and their speed and range were similar to the Gnevny class.
translation: 机智级（7U工程）驱逐舰是之前愤怒级的改良型号。其发动机进行了重新设计，他们有较强的对空武器。它们的排水量在1900到2400吨之间，并且他们的速度和航程都和愤怒级相似。

original: The Skoryi class (Project 30bis) was a further improvement on the Ognevoy class. The increase in size and displacement (2,500-3,100 tons) resulted in a more stable ship with an increased operational range. All ships were built after the War to a modular design that resulted in rapid construction and deployment times. Their armament was the same as that of the previous Ognevoy class, but the main guns were housed in twin turrets instead of single turrets.
translation: 迅速级（30工程改良）是射击级的进一步改良型号。大小和排水量（2,500-3,100吨）的增加使其具备进一步的稳定性和增加的操作射程。所有舰船在战后建成了模块化设计，使其具备快速建设和减少部署时间的能力。他们的武器和以前射击级相同，但主要的枪炮被安置在双炮塔，而不是单炮塔。

original: The Krasniy Krym class cruiser, originally the Svetlana class cruiser, had her construction started before WWI but the war and the following revolution delayed the completion of the entire class. In the mid-late 1920's, she was finally commissioned into the Soviet Navy along with her half-sister Chervona Ukraina (ex Admiral Nakhimov). These vessels were the first turbine-driven cruisers of the Imperial Russian Navy. They were heavily armed and well-armored cruisers for their time.
translation: 红克里米亚级巡洋舰，也是原斯韦特兰娜级巡洋舰，是在一战前开始建造，但战争和革命延迟了整个级别舰船的完成。在二十世纪二十年代中后期，她和她同父异母的姐妹船红乌克兰（前纳希莫夫海军上将级）终于委任服役于苏联海军。这些船只是俄罗斯帝国海军的第一批涡轮驱动的巡洋舰。他们在当时是配备了重型武器和装甲的巡洋舰。

original: The Komsomolets class light cruisers were series of hypothetical vessels. They were somewhat of a mix of older and new technologies. Using the incomplete hulls of the Svetlana and Admiral Nakhimov classes, the ship's construction costs were reduced. Equipped with six twin turrets of smaller, destroyer caliber guns and adequate AA armament they were suited for scouting and a destroyer flotilla leader role. The overall look of the ships bears similarities to the Kirov class cruisers.
translation: 苏联共青团级轻巡是一系列假设的船体。它们是有些旧的和新技术的混合体。使用斯韦特兰娜和纳希莫夫海军上将级的不完整的船体，船体的建造成本降低。装备了6台更小的驱逐舰口径的双火炮塔和充足的对空装备，它们适用于侦查和作为驱逐舰队指挥单位。船体的整体外观和基洛夫级巡洋舰相似。

original: The Chapayev class (Project 68) cruisers were based on the Kirov class (Project 26) cruisers and authorized in the 1938-43 shipbuilding program. As the first true light cruisers of the Soviet navy, they carried a strong anti-surface and anti-air armament together with an adequate torpedo armament. Overall, these were good ships with a thick armor belt, high speed, a good operational range, and a displacement of 10,500 to 14,000 tons.
